name: Seas and subways III
description:
Dangerous monotony of the traveler. The one who guesses the shadows, the flickering lights, the sounds, the hassles...
No recreation in the station, just a little change and back to the dark and wired corridor. 
Voracity and trance.

And what if, for a moment, I could feel the sea air or a gentle wave caressing the platform?

Seas and subways: a game of contrasts. Sweet interference to the subway routine.


video art  //  from "Seas and subways" series  //  720p  //  2012
